quest.name: Lost in Transit
journal: This Resistance fighter is growing impatient.
objectives: Deliver the supply crate to Guntmar.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02834
dialogue.text: Ah, adventurer. I have great need of your assistance. One of our men left to deliver provisions to a camp in the north and has yet to return.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02834
dialogue.text: I fear he may have been attacked in transit, but with so much to attend to here in Ala Ghiri, none can spare the time to join me in searching for him.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02834
dialogue.text: With you at my side, I'm certain we can see him home safely. Come! If he is gravely injured, he can ill afford for us to delay.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02834
dialogue.text: It seems I was right to ask for your aid. He will need treatment, but his wounds are not severe.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02834
dialogue.text: There is still the matter of the provisions, however. Would you continue with the delivery while I see him back to town? They were meant for Guntmar. Continue north, and you'll find him.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02834
dialogue.text: You needn't worry about us. The path back is clear. You must see to it those provisions make it to Guntmar.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: An adventurer? What are you doing in a place like this?

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Ah, our provisions! But how did you get a hold of them?

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: I see. Well I'm glad to hear he's going to be okay.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Could have been worse, you know. There's the Qiqirn to the north, and Gods know what else is lurking about out here.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: I'd much rather work a position back in town, but orders are orders.

dialogue.name: GUNTMAR
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, I have another week's worth of food and drink to keep me going.

obj.n: For the Living and the Dead
